隐私政策

 1. 简介
 微信消息助手（以下简称"我们"或"本应用"）重视用户的隐私和个人信息保护。本隐私政策说明我们如何收集、使用和保护您的信息。


2. 信息收集
 我们收集以下信息：
 • 无障碍服务状态
 • 应用设置和偏好
 • 消息处理统计数据
 • 服务运行状态


3. 信息使用
 收集的信息用于：
 • 提供自动消息处理功能
 • 维持服务稳定性
 • 改善用户体验
 • 保存您的偏好设置


4. 数据存储与安全
 • 所有数据仅存储在您的设备本地
 • 我们不收集或传输任何个人信息
 • 我们不与第三方共享任何数据


5. 所需权限
 本应用需要：
 • 无障碍服务：用于处理微信消息
 • 通知访问：用于显示服务状态通知


6. 用户控制
 您可以：
 • 随时启用/禁用服务
 • 通过卸载应用清除所有数据
 • 通过设置控制所有功能


7. 微信内容
 • 我们不会读取、存储或传输您的微信消息
 • 我们仅处理界面事件以实现自动化操作


8. 更新
 • 本隐私政策可能会不定期更新
 • 重要变更将通过应用更新时通知


9. 联系方式
 如果您对本隐私政策有任何疑问，请通过应用内的反馈渠道与我们联系。


10. 合规性
 • 我们遵守相关隐私保护法规
 • 我们尊重用户隐私和数据保护权利


使用本应用即表示您同意本隐私政策。

Privacy Policy

Last updated: March 16, 2025

Introduction

Welcome to WeChat Message Assistant (\"the App\"). Protecting your privacy is our top priority. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

Information Collection

The App only collects information necessary for automatic WeChat message processing, including:

  • WeChat message notification content (only when accessibility service is enabled)
  • App usage statistics (such as number of messages processed and last check time)
  • Your preferences in the app

Information Usage

We collect information only for:

  • Providing automatic click and message processing functionality
  • Improving app performance and user experience
  • Saving your preferences

We do not use your personal information for any other purpose, nor do we share it with any third parties.

Information Storage

All your information is stored locally on your device using Android\'s SharedPreferences mechanism. We do not upload any of your data to the cloud or servers.

Permissions

This app requires the following permissions:

  • Accessibility Service: For detecting and processing WeChat notifications and automatic clicking
  • Notification Access: For reading new WeChat message notifications

Information Security

We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.

Children\'s Privacy

This app is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

Privacy Policy Updates

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any significant changes will be notified to you through in-app notifications or other appropriate means.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about this privacy policy, please contact us through the app\'s feedback feature.
